activities: This certification applies to Reddit, Inc. ("Reddit"), which receives and processes personal data relating to past, present, and prospective users, interns, contractors, employees, and individual contacts of service suppliers/vendors located in the EEA and/or Switzerland (“Personal Data”).  Reddit uses, stores and processes Personal Data for different purposes, which may include any of the following: user support and/or user relationship management; fraud detection; sales and marketing; compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies; human resources management; operating, developing and improving the Reddit products and services; and other legitimate business purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline personal data described above, which may be manually and/or automatically processed
recoursemech: For non-HR data, Reddit will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules. For HR data only, Reddit will cooperate with EEA data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
